participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and empathetic, always striving to make her family proud.
participant_1.background: I run for my mom. My mom is a checker at the local grocery store. I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change. My family is supportive of me and my dance team. I work as a waitress.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Passionate and affectionate, especially towards his hobbies and pets.
participant_2.background: I enjoy working on cars and spending time with my pets; they are both important hobbies to me. I'm grateful for my pets and I'm getting used to my new home. My goal is to be a great teacher and inspire my students to be the best they can be. I own a dog who is my best friend. I really love plants.

content.text: Hi there. What do you like to do?
I like working on cars and spending time with my pets, they are both important hobbies to me.
That's awesome. What kind of cars do you like working on?
I like working on all kinds of cars, but my favorite are classic cars.
That's cool. I've always wanted to own a classic car.
They're a lot of fun to drive and work on.
I bet. What kind of pets do you have?
I have a dog and a cat.
That's great. I have a dog too.
They are. He's my best friend.
